experiences.description: Handle customer requests in a hybrid environment, prioritizing issues and communicating clearly. Direct exposure to the customer journey helps craft coherent messaging and page flows, identify friction points, and improve post-click satisfaction (SEO/SEA).
experiences.seo_sea_focus: Understanding user intent and journey to optimize wording, information hierarchy, and CTAs on SEO/SEA landing pages.

experiences.description: Welcome and guide international visitors, manage flows and safety, and deliver immersive bilingual interactions. High-traffic setting with strong focus on user experience and clear communication—useful for understanding user intent and crafting effective journeys.
experiences.seo_sea_focus: Sense of user journey and intent, transferable to landing page optimization and SEA messaging.

experiences.description: Design and deliver MVPs, dashboards, and custom business tools with a focus on load time and technical structure for discoverability. Build fullstack apps (REST/GraphQL APIs, React frontends, Node backends) with careful attention to Core Web Vitals, semantic markup, and structured data to boost SEO. Integrate Stripe, SQL/NoSQL databases, and CI/CD (Docker, Vercel, AWS) for fast, reliable releases, while refining UX to maximize conversion and traffic quality.
experiences.seo_sea_focus: Core Web Vitals, semantic markup, structured data, front/back performance for technical SEO; UX and conversions for SEA.

experiences.description: Built reactive interfaces in React/Next.js and optimized Node/TypeScript/GraphQL APIs. Improved frontend performance and structure (MUI, Next routing) to speed up indexing, reduce CLS, and improve LCP, while integrating Stripe and PostgreSQL. Goal: make ordering flows reliable and page quality strong to convert acquired traffic (SEO/SEA).
experiences.seo_sea_focus: LCP/CLS optimization, Next.js page hierarchy, prerendering and caching for technical SEO; UX consistency to improve paid conversions.

experiences.description: Built ReactJS interfaces with Redux and Bootstrap, ChartJS visualizations, and Node APIs. Strengthened semantic structure, frontend performance, and caching to speed up menu/product pages, aiding crawl and response times, with a focus on conversion (menus, checkout).
experiences.seo_sea_focus: Semantic structure, load-time reduction, UX on product and checkout pages for local SEO and SEA campaigns.

experiences.description: Developed a financial audit web app using an internal JS framework. Delivered lightweight interfaces and scripts to boost interactivity and perceived performance, with a focus on accessibility and clear flows to increase user engagement.
experiences.seo_sea_focus: Performance and accessibility to support indexability and quality post-click journeys.

experiences.description: Network deployment (IP, VLAN), Linux/Windows server administration, VMware virtualization, monitoring and security. Improved environment reliability—foundations for fast, available sites.
experiences.seo_sea_focus: Backend response times and reliability, beneficial for technical SEO and post-click experience quality.

experiences.description: Supported network deployments, configured Linux/Windows servers, VMware VMs, and monitoring. Produced technical documentation for maintainability and service continuity.
experiences.seo_sea_focus: Stability and monitoring for consistent response times, supporting technical SEO.

experiences.description: Level 1/2 support, Linux/Windows administration, exposure to network architectures and VMware, observation of backup and monitoring processes. Built understanding of performance and availability requirements.
experiences.seo_sea_focus: Infrastructure stability and security as prerequisites for strong technical web performance.

experiences.description: Workstation maintenance (Windows/Linux), AD account administration, VMware VM management, participation in critical infrastructure monitoring. Authored procedures to standardize interventions.
experiences.seo_sea_focus: Service availability and responsiveness, preventing UX drop-offs after click.

experiences.description: User support, preventive/corrective maintenance, initial VMware virtualization experience, and network setup participation. Documented interventions.
experiences.seo_sea_focus: Reliability and service continuity to avoid UX degradation (bounce) in SEO/SEA.
